alert.note: Alert for Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:38PM EDT until July 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ELKHART...EAST CENTRAL ST. JOSEPH...NORTHERN KOSCIUSKO AND NORTHEASTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 937 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Millersburg to New Paris to near Wakarusa, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Nappanee, Syracuse, Milford, and New Paris around 945 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Southwest, Foraker, Gravelton, Locke, Benton, Oakwood Park, and Waterford Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
